name: feedmob-agent-skills
description: A collection of skills for agents
author: FeedMob

skills.name: feedmob-brand-guidelines
skills.description: Generate FeedMob-branded content including reports, presentations, charts, and artifacts following official brand guidelines. Use when creating any FeedMob-branded materials.

skills.name: feedmob-presentations
skills.description: Create, edit, and analyze PowerPoint presentations with professional styling, themes, and layouts. Supports python-pptx for creation and OOXML manipulation for advanced editing.
